recipesJson.name: Bunny Love
recipesJson.author: VaporDude
recipesJson.description: A sweet glass of strawberry milk rich buttery milky cream with a nice sweet strawberry that will make some bunny love to your tongue.

reviews.text: Sweet strawberry and butter cream...it's been done a thousand times, but that's because it just works.  Your version of it is a nice vape, both rich and vibrant at the same time.
Nice strawberry ice cream.  Really enjoyed this vape.
